description.value:
Granted Powers: You follow a strict and ordered code of laws, and in so doing, achieve enlightenment.

Domain Spells:

  • 1st—@Compendium[pf1.spells.md6ltvqh9paadsm4]{Protection From Chaos}
  • 2nd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.zujht80bgjdk9cyb]{Align Weapon} (law only)
  • 3rd—@Compendium[pf1.spells.6ne7ot8lcaiva3f9]{Magic Circle against Chaos}
  • 4th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.8zeulunjetwrdgwj]{Order's Wrath}
  • 5th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.3lgy3s4h4087ojht]{Dispel Chaos}
  • 6th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.d8hypv6zdyan3rzr]{Hold Monster}
  • 7th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.7e22urxux6i2mua5]{Dictum}
  • 8th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.lzj5umxjvogvpg6b]{Shield of Law}
  • 9th—@Compendium[pf1.spells.mi52crelhwuy6bmp]{Summon Monster IX} (law spell only)
